settings.title: 带文本图片
settings.text: 将大文本与图片配对，以便将焦点置于您选择的产品、产品系列或博客文章。添加有关可用性和样式的详细信息，甚至是提供评论。

settings.text2: A question, a remark, a suggestion or anything else. We want to hear from you! Let us know your thoughts, we will reply to you as soon as possible.

settings.add: UNIT 917A, 9/F., TOWER A, NEW MANDARIN PLAZA, No.14, SCIENCE MUSEUM ROAD TSIMSHATSUI, HK

settings.text2:
HOZO Design launched the first digital product, ROLLOVA, in 2018, which marks the beginning of a journey to explore and pioneer extraordinary technology. Today, HOZO brings the aesthetics of technology to global consumers through variety of smart devices.

We have presence in over 20 countries and regions, and have set up 2 research institutes and R&D centers in both Asia and North America. Together, HOZO Design team members join their efforts to create beautiful life for people.
Video, Press Articles & Customer Testimonials

settings.text1:
[MEAZOR Unboxing]
What's included in MEAZOR "Family Bucket"?
User Instructions - How to use MEAZOR?

settings.text2: “As far as we can find no other device does it all or is as useful as MEAZOR. ”
“This tiny laser device can replace every single measuring tools you use!”
“The MEAZOR has been engineered to fit seamlessly into creative lifestyles, and is currently the smallest 2D laser room scanner in the world.”
"MEAZOR has been meticulously designed to be used in everyday life, to make measuring easier and more enjoyable for all.”
"MEAZOR, Laser Measure HERO! It offers a tremendous amount of eminently useful measuring functions."
"A compact digital laser measurer with more tricks up its sleeve than David Blaine."
United States
settings.text4: It's a good value for 2D data collection offering multiple data collection modes and useful file transfer formats.I've been looking for a device to do what MEAZOR does for about the last two years.  I'm glad I finally found it.

settings.text2: United States
settings.text4: MEAZOR is an excellent tool with a really nice build quality. I can imagine that this would be invaluable to a real estate agent.It's quick, accurate and very intuitive to use.  I've check the laser length measurement against known accurate distances and find it to be dead on, and  repeatable. It's also easier to carry than a bulky tape, and I can record measurements automatically,  no need to write anything down.  I love it.

settings.text2: Canada
settings.text4: I've already recommended this to a few friends, showed it to them and they've loved it! It not only saves time, but saves you from recording incorrect measurements and takes the guesswork out of determining angles. This device is a game changer.

settings.text2: Mexico
settings.text4: MEAZOR is the perfect assistant for the work of an Architect, both on site and in the diagnosis of buildings.

settings.text2: Switzerland
settings.text4: The MEAZOR is really versatile and can be used in different types of measurement whether in architecture or object design and without forgetting to read a geographical map or even calculate the curves, not to mention accessories and spare parts.

settings.text2: Gibraltar
settings.text4: I bought MEAZOR primarily as a laser measuring device which had the added benefit of having a curve measuring tool.. However, it does so much more than that! Plus, it even fits in my pocket!! 10/10

settings.text2: United States
settings.text4: If you need to measure rooms or distances that are annoying with a tape measure, the Meazor will simplify your life! The laser measuring mode is the most used. Absolutely amazingly useful and easy.

settings.text2: United States
settings.text4: I work in architecture. I would recommend MEAZOR to my friends that do residential architecture. It would be great for them to get a laser-accurate measurement of a room when they have a project. If the product could do multiple rooms with accuracy in a single scan, then I would recommend it to anyone in the industry as it would be a much easier version of a point cloud scan of an existing building.

settings.text2: New Zealand
settings.text4: I've tried a few laser measuring tools over time, but the MEAZOR is the first that is so easy to use, displays all the info I need, and offers so many useful modes. Add in the app that allows all of this to be captured, stored and exported, and you have a great package.

settings.text2: Spain
settings.text4: The measurement system is very precise, it is as precise as my old "LEICA" equipment.  The most impressive thing about MEAZOR is the generation of 2D plans in the app, very useful for renovations where there are no plans of the place.

settings.text2: United States
settings.text4: High quality measurements in the palm of your hand.   Easy to use and intuitive, MEAZOR makes mapping out floor plans a breeze.

settings.text2: United Kingdom
settings.text4: Must have for home DIYers. One tool to help you tackle the entire project, from measuring to design and layout, to finishing touches.

settings.text1: “An innovative new way to measure that leaves old-fashioned methods in the dust”
“Most Advanced INCH TAPE - ROLLOVA DIGITAL TAPE”

settings.text2: “This Compact “Rolling Ruler” Seeks to Change how Architects Measure”
“This incredible ruler can measure a wide range of surfaces, objects, and materials with a single motion.”
“Its obvious strength is in measuring curved or uneven surfaces”
“we found the ROLLOVA impressive”
“ユニークで実用的な機能に加えて、スタイリッシュなデザインが素晴らしい”(In addition to unique and practical features, the stylish design is amazing)
United States
settings.text4: Got it for my wife mostly. She has a problem seeing a tape measure since she lost vision in her right eye, and having to count the small hash marks. This “roller tape measure” gives the measurements in easy to read digital numbers in and fractions. I love it too. Worth the money!!!

settings.text2: United States
settings.text4: “The anticipation for this product was worth the wait. I’m a math teacher and splurged for my ROLLOVA and have been able to show the general rule we strive for in my math classes: strive to find a different, cool, efficient way of doing something that others will find useful and appreciate.”

settings.text2: United Kingdom
settings.text4: Its a great design. Well done guys in changing the concept of measuring.

settings.text2:
· 1.3-inch (diagonal) IPS-backlit display
· 240×240 resolution at 184 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors.

· Built-in 650 mAh lithium‑polymer battery
· Support 5V -1A Charging with USB-C Port.
0-100% charging time: 2 hours. *Adapter with fast charging protocol will not be supported.
30 days battery life in stand-by mode, 6 hours continuous use under comprehensive power consumption. 0.75 hours continuous use under maximum power consumption.

· Measure range: 0.3feet-82feets (0.1m-25m).
· Resolution: 0.04inch(1mm)
· Accuracy: +-0.12inch (+-3mm) in ideal circumstance. *
*Non-ideal circumstances such as outdoor with strong light or under the bad reflective surface, the error will be superimposed with maximum +-1‰ of the measuring distance.

· Measure range: 0-300feets (0-99meters)
· Resolution: 0.04inch(1mm)
· Accuracy: +-1mm or ±0.2% in ideal circumstances. **
**The accuracy will be decreased on slippery, uneven, soft, curved surfaces. Inclination, misalignment and other human error factors will also affect the measurement accuracy.

· Metric Architecture
· Metric Engineering
· US Architecture
· US Engineering

· Measuring Range: maximum room size:12900feet² or 1200m².
· Accuracy: +-0.5in² (+-25mm²) in ideal circumstances.***
***Non-ideal circumstances such as outdoor with strong light, or under the bad reflective surface, the error will be superimposed with maximum +- 1‰ of the measuring distance.

· Maximum Curve Length(start point-endpoint): 82feets(25 meters)
· Resolution: Angel Resolution : 1.0°
· Length Resolution: 0.04inch(+-1mm)

· Measuring range: Dual axis +-90°
· Resolution: 0.1°
· Accuracy: ±0.2°at 0° ~45° , ±0.4° at other angles

· Measuring range: 0~360°
· Resolution: 0.17°
· Accuracy: ±0.3°at 0°~180°, ±0.4° at other angles

· Pythagorean mode with triangle third-side and area calculation.
· Area mode with rectangular area calculation.
· Export graphic to MEAZOR app.

· Operating temperature: 50° to 95° F (10° to 35° C)
· Relative humidity: 0% to 90% noncondensing

· General Measure: inch, foot, yard, mm, cm, meter
· Large Scale Measure: inch, foot, yard, miles, mm, cm, meter, km

· Android 6.0 or above and requires minimum 4GB ram. Adapt to phones and tablets.
· iOS 13 or above. Adapt to phones and tablets.
· Connection protocol: Bluetooth 4.0 wireless connection.
Maximum Tolerance +-0.4%

Please follow the steps below at first to self-check

- Use Support 5V -1A Charging with USB-C Port to charge MEAZOR (takes 2 hours to fully charge). Please note that MEAZOR doesn't support adapters with fast charging protocol.

- Unplug and wait 4 seconds then restart the device.

If you still have still cannot to charge, please contact support@hozodesign.com for further assistance.

Please send the following information to our support team to help a quicker investigation:

- Has the blue indicator light always on and the screen does not light up of the MEAZOR?

- Which specific function/condition leads to crashes?

- What is the frequency of product crashes?

- MEAZOR firmware version number

- MEAZOR serial number

Please send us pictures or videos about the MEAZOR crash if you could, so that we could forward to our engineer to solve your problem faster, and please contact us at suopport@hozodesign.com at your convenience.

Please send the following information to our support team to help a quicker investigation:

- Which specific function/condition lead to crashes?

- What is the frequency of product/App crashes?

- Mobile phone model, mobile phone system and mobile phone brand

- MEAZOR App version number

Please send us pictures or videos about the MEAZOR App crash if you could, so that we could forward to our engineer to solve your problem faster, and please contact us at suopport@hozodesign.com at your convenience.

settings.text1: Where to find MEAZOR serial number?
settings.text2: The serial number of MEAZOR could be found beside the box, and all the products with the serial number on the box is eligible to the 1-year limited warranty, it’s not a test device or demonstration. We've updated the position of the serial number and didn't update it in the user instruction for devices produced before Mar, 2022.

settings.text1: How far is the laser distance measurement range? What is the accuracy?
settings.text2: The measurable distance of laser measurers ranges from from 0.1m-25m (0.3feet-82feets), the measurement accuracy stands ±2mm (±0.08 inch)

settings.text1: How far can the Rolling Ruler measurement range? What is the accuracy?
settings.text2: Rolling Ruler is recommended to measure the length that less than 5m. The measurement accuracy is ±0.2% on rough surfaces, and the accuracy will be impacted due to human error when measuring long distance.

settings.text1: How to determine the Rolling Ruler’s start/end point?
settings.text2: There are three blue indication lights at the bottom of the product for aligning the measurement start/end points.

settings.text1: How many scales are supported by the Roller Ruler scale measurement?
settings.text2:
4 built-in scale modes with 57 scales in total
- Metric Architecture
- Metric Engineering
- US Architecture
- US Engineering

There are 2 modes of 2D floorplan scanning function: 
1.	Point Scanner: Point Scanner is a manual positioning mode that allows you choose key points around the room for precise floorplan captures. It fit measuring demands of floorplan and room plan.
2.	Curve Scanner: curve scanner is an automatic mode that can perform scanning by simply turning the machine 360 degrees. It suits measuring demand of odd-shape/curve-shape objects, structures and architectures.

settings.text1: What is curve scan? How to use this function?
settings.text2: Curve scan is designed mainly for the measurement of irregular curves. Place the product horizontally on the edge of the curved surface and turning the body 360 degrees. The measurement could be sent to the APP for editing via Bluetooth.

settings.text1: What is the range of Point scanner and curve scanner? What is the accuracy?
settings.text2: Point scanner and curve scanner can measure the maximum area of 1200m² (12900feet²). The measurement error is proportional to the area of the scanned floor: ±0.5cm-±10cm (0.2inch-4inch). The source of the measured area and accuracy data is from laboratory test results.

settings.text1: How many data can MEAZOR store?
settings.text2: MEAZOR does not support internal data storage, but if you use MEAZOR App, there is no limit on data storage.

settings.text1: How long the battery last per full charge? How much is the battery capacity?
settings.text2: The theoretical standby time for a fully charged MEAZOR is around 30 days, and the continuous working time last around 16 hours. Battery capacity is 650mah.

settings.text1: How long does it take to fully charge MEAZOR?
settings.text2: 2 hours

settings.text1: What does MEAZOR’s 3 indicator lights stand for?
settings.text2:
About the Indicator light description that as shown below：
- Charging or powering: yellow
- Turn on or Turn off: blue

settings.text1: What does the battery icon on the screen stands for?
settings.text2:
- Charging: white 
- Out of power: red
We hope it helps and if you have any question about product please contact us at  
suppport@hozodesign.com.

settings.text1: How does it measure into the corner or between walls?
settings.text2: SImply press the offset button at back of ROLLOVA, that can add diameter or radius of ROLLOVA to your measurement.

settings.text1: [Diagnosis]: The main LCD screen is not working and the bottom light still works.
settings.text2: The ROLLOVA might have low battery given the description. We recommend you to replace the 1632 button battery. If the screen still not work after replacing batteries, please contact our customer support team.

settings.text1: [Diagnosis]: The ROLLOVA is not rolling smoothly, what happens?
settings.text2: The roller system is built with a certain fraction level to ensure it doesn't slip on most surfaces. But because the fraction between ROLLOVA's tire and surfaces could vary among different materials (e.g. glass, rough surfaces), it may give you the impression of not rolling smoothly sometimes.

settings.title: MEAZOR 3D Support
settings.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MEAZOR 3D!

settings.qustion: 1.  What is the Laser Distance measurement range? What is the accuracy?
settings.answer:
In the ideal circumstances: the laser measure ranges from 0.3ft-131ft ( 0.1m- 40m ), and the measurement accuracy stands ±1/16 in (±2mm).
Non-ideal circumstances: such as outdoors with strong light, or under a bad reflective surface, the error will be superimposed with a maximum +- 1‰ of the measurement distance.

settings.qustion: 2.  How many scales are supported by the Roller Ruler scale measurement?
settings.answer: The currently supported ratios are 4 built – modes with 57 scales.

settings.qustion: 3.  How much data can MEAZOR 3D store?
settings.answer: MEAZOR 3D supports 200 built-in data storage, 100 for Laser Distance, and 100 for Scale/Rolling Ruler. And there is no limit on data storage on MEAZOR APP.

settings.qustion: 4.  What is the Point Scanner (Floor Plan) measurement range? What is the accuracy？
settings.answer:
In ideal circumstances: the Point Scanner measurement range is 184ft x 184ft (33,856ft²) or 56m x 56m (3135m²)， and the measurement accuracy stands ±1in (±25mm).
Non-ideal circumstances: such as outdoors with strong light, or under a bad reflective surface, the error will be superimposed with a maximum +- 2‰ of the measurement distance.

settings.qustion: 5. How to get a more accurate result for Point Scanner/Curve Scanner function?
settings.answer: There are several key points during operation that can lead to measuring errors, please ensure following MEAZOR 3D Point Scanner Operation Guide at: https://hozodesign.com/blogs/journal/meazor-3d-dos-donts-operation-guide

settings.qustion: 6. Does MEAZOR 3D support fast charging? How long does it take to fully charge MEAZOR 3D?
settings.answer: MEAZOR 3D supports fast charge applicable with USB-C, with 30 days standby, and 6 hours continuous usage. MEAZOR 3D takes 2 hours to be fully charged.

settings.qustion: 7. How many units are supported by MEAZOR 3D?
settings.answer:
-General: mm cm, m, in (decimal), in (fractional), ft-in (decimal), ft-in (fractional), yard,
-Large Scale Measure: km, mile.

settings.qustion: 8. What languages does the MEAZOR APP come with?
settings.answer:
Both MEAZOR 3D and MEAZOR App support 7 Languages: 
English (US), Mandarin (Traditional), Japanese, Italian, German, Spain, French

settings.qustion: 9. Which file formats are supported for export?
settings.answer: MEAZOR APP can export files in dxf .pdf .jpg formats.

settings.qustion: 10. What is the difference between MEAZOR 3D Premium Combo and MEAZOR 3D?
settings.answer:
Compare to MEAZOR 3D standard edition, MEAZOR 3D Premium Combo includes 2 extra accessories that worth $99:
1.	x 1 Ultra 3D Adapter
2.	x 2 Target Plates

settings.qustion: 11. How can MEAZOR 3D measure arch doors and windows?
settings.answer:
If you would like to scan arch doors and windows (that need to place MEAZOR 3D vertically and scan the vertical shape of the window/door)
MEAZOR 3D's curve scanner function was not originally designed to complete vertical scanning tasks, because it requires to use of a third-party joint ball tripod accessory to assist vertical measurement and the accuracy of scanning cannot be guaranteed while using third-party accessories.
https://hozodesign.com/pages/meazor 3d-support

settings.qustion: 12.Where to find MEAZOR 3D serial number?
settings.answer: The serial number of MEAZOR 3D could be found beside the box, and all the products with the serial number on the box are eligible for the 1-year limited warranty, it’s not a test device or demonstration.

settings.qustion: 14. What does the battery icon on the screen stands for?
settings.answer:
- Charging: white 
- Out of power: red

settings.qustion: 15. [Diagnosis] MEAZOR APP crash/ not working.
settings.answer:
Please send the following information to our support team to help with a quicker investigation:
- Which specific function/condition leads to crashes?
- What is the frequency of product/App crashes? 
- Mobile phone model, mobile phone system, and mobile phone brand
- MEAZOR App version number
- MEAZOR 3D firmware version

Please send us pictures or videos about the MEAZOR App crash if you could, so that we could forward it to our engineer to solve your problem faster, and please contact us at suopport@hozodesign.com at your convenience.

settings.qustion: 16.	Which Android version does MEAZOR App require？
settings.answer: MEAZOR App Android works on Android 9.0 or above and requires at least 4GB ram

settings.qustion: 17.	Which IOS version does MEAZOR App require？
settings.answer: MEAZOR App iOS works on iOS 14 or above.

settings.qustion: 18.	What languages does the APP comes with?
settings.answer:
Both MEAZOR and MEAZOR App support 8 Languages: 
English (US), Chinese (Simplified), Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Italian, German, Spain, French

settings.qustion: 19.	What file formats are supported for export?
settings.answer:
Drawing Mode: export files in .dxf(2D) .dxf(3D) , Also export scale drawing in .pdf .jpg formats(auto-scale fit to A3(Metrics) / Tabloid(Imperial) size paper)
List Mode: export files in excel sheet(.xls), .txt

settings.qustion: 20. Does MEAZOR 3D support WIFI/4G/Bluetooth?
settings.answer: MEAZOR supports Bluetooth 4.0 connection with the MEAZOR App.

settings.qustion: 21. How to upgrade MEAZOR 3D? How long does per upgrade take?
settings.answer: MEAZOR can be upgraded via Bluetooth after pairing with the MEAZOR App, the upgrade time is around 5 minutes which depends on the Bluetooth speed.

settings.qustion: 22. Does MEAZOR App comes with a cloud storage function? Is there an account I can register/log in?
settings.answer: There is no cloud storage function on MEAZOR APP at present. And it doesn’t require signing up/registering an account

settings.title: HOZO is Born in Rochester, NY
settings.description: Launched ROLLOVA - the world’s 1st digital rolling ruler on Kickstarter in RIT studio with a strong passion for bringing technology to people’s lives with authentic design.

settings.title: Set up R&D Center in Hong Kong
settings.description: Kickoff product development to build a product that would resonate on a global scale with a core technological challenge and a compelling impact on the industry.

settings.title: Began to Grow in Guangzhou
settings.description: Bringing together industrial leading product designers, geomatics experts, mechanical engineers and passionate storytellers.

settings.title: Introducing MEAZOR to the World
settings.description: 3 years after the original idea was born, HOZO launched the flagship product – MEAZOR on Kickstarter, and the international jury committee honored it with Good Design Award 2021.

settings.title: MEAZOR 3D is Born, Better and Stronger
settings.description: After reviewing thousands of feedback from MEAZOR users, we learned from the community and launched the next generation, MEAZOR 3D, chosen by Kickstater as Project We Love.

settings.title: Beyond Future
settings.description: HOZO team is driven by an obsessive passion for creating better products to make a better life. Be the first to know about our latest innovations by following our newsletter.

settings.title: About HOZO
settings.sub_title:
HOZO Design is an emerging high-tech company dedicated to world's leading innovative design and development of intelligent consumer electronics.

With the idea of "design + intelligence", HOZO strives to bring the aesthetics of technology to global consumers with diversified new products.

settings.title: MEAZOR  Support
settings.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MEAZOR!

settings.qustion: 1. [Diagnosis] MEAZOR cannot be charged
settings.answer:
Please follow the steps below at first to self-check

- Use Support 5V -1A Charging with USB-C Port to charge MEAZOR (takes 2 hours to fully charge). Please note that MEAZOR doesn't support adapters with fast charging protocol.

- Unplug and wait 4 seconds then restart the device.

If you still have still cannot to charge, please contact support@hozodesign.com for further assistance.

settings.qustion: 2. [Diagnosis] MEAZOR crash/not working
settings.answer:
Please send the following information to our support team to help a quicker investigation:

- Has the blue indicator light always on and the screen does not light up of the MEAZOR?

- Which specific function/condition leads to crashes?

- What is the frequency of product crashes?

- MEAZOR firmware version number

- MEAZOR serial number

Please send us pictures or videos about the MEAZOR crash if you could, so that we could forward to our engineer to solve your problem faster, and please contact us at suopport@hozodesign.com at your convenience.

settings.qustion: 3. [Diagnosis] MEAZOR App crash/not working
settings.answer:
Please send the following information to our support team to help a quicker investigation:

- Which specific function/condition lead to crashes?

- What is the frequency of product/App crashes?

- Mobile phone model, mobile phone system and mobile phone brand

- MEAZOR App version number

Please send us pictures or videos about the MEAZOR App crash if you could, so that we could forward to our engineer to solve your problem faster, and please contact us at suopport@hozodesign.com at your convenience.

settings.qustion: 4. Where to find MEAZOR serial number?
settings.answer: The serial number of MEAZOR could be found beside the box, and all the products with the serial number on the box is eligible to the 1-year limited warranty, it’s not a test device or demonstration. We've updated the position of the serial number and didn't update it in the user instruction for devices produced before Mar, 2022.

settings.qustion: 5.	How far is the laser distance measurement range? What is the accuracy?
settings.answer: The measurable distance of laser measurers ranges from from 0.1m-25m (0.3feet-82feets), the measurement accuracy stands ±2mm (±0.08 inch)

settings.qustion: 6.	How far can the Rolling Ruler measurement range? What is the accuracy?
settings.answer: Rolling Ruler is recommended to measure the length that less than 5m. The measurement accuracy is ±0.2% on rough surfaces, and the accuracy will be impacted due to human error when measuring long distance.

settings.qustion: 7.	How to determine the Rolling Ruler’s start/end point?
settings.answer: There are three blue indication lights at the bottom of the product for aligning the measurement start/end points.

settings.qustion: 8.	How many scales are supported by the Roller Ruler scale measurement?
settings.answer: 4 built-in scale modes with 57 scales in total - Metric Architecture - Metric Engineering - US Architecture - US Engineering

settings.qustion: 9. How to perform 2D Floorplan Scanning?
settings.answer: There are 2 modes of 2D floorplan scanning function: 1. Point Scanner: Point Scanner is a manual positioning mode that allows you choose key points around the room for precise floorplan captures. It fit measuring demands of floorplan and room plan. 2. Curve Scanner: curve scanner is an automatic mode that can perform scanning by simply turning the machine 360 degrees. It suits measuring demand of odd-shape/curve-shape objects, structures and architectures.

settings.qustion: 10.What is curve scan? How to use this function?
settings.answer: Curve scan is designed mainly for the measurement of irregular curves. Place the product horizontally on the edge of the curved surface and turning the body 360 degrees. The measurement could be sent to the APP for editing via Bluetooth.

settings.qustion: 11. What is the range of Point scanner and curve scanner? What is the accuracy?
settings.answer: Point scanner and curve scanner can measure the maximum area of 1200m² (12900feet²). The measurement error is proportional to the area of the scanned floor: ±0.5cm-±10cm (0.2inch-4inch). The source of the measured area and accuracy data is from laboratory test results.

settings.qustion: 12. How many data can MEAZOR store?
settings.answer: MEAZOR does not support internal data storage, but if you use MEAZOR App, there is no limit on data storage.

settings.qustion: 13. How long the battery last per full charge? How much is the battery capacity?
settings.answer: The theoretical standby time for a fully charged MEAZOR is around 30 days, and the continuous working time last around 16 hours. Battery capacity is 650mah.

settings.qustion: 14. How long does it take to fully charge MEAZOR?
settings.answer: 2 hours

settings.qustion: 15. What does MEAZOR’s 3 indicator lights stand for?
settings.answer: About the Indicator light description that as shown below： - Charging or powering: yellow - Turn on or Turn off: blue

settings.qustion: 16. What does the battery icon on the screen stands for?
settings.answer: - Charging: white - Out of power: red We hope it helps and if you have any question about product please contact us at suppport@hozodesign.com.

settings.title: ROLLOVA Support
settings.subtitle: Everything you need to know about ROLLOVA!

settings.qustion: How does it measure into the corner or between walls?
settings.answer: SImply press the offset button at back of ROLLOVA, that can add diameter or radius of ROLLOVA to your measurement.

settings.qustion: [Diagnosis]: The main LCD screen is not working and the bottom light still works.
settings.answer: The ROLLOVA might have low battery given the description. We recommend you to replace the 1632 button battery. If the screen still not work after replacing batteries, please contact our customer support team.

settings.qustion: [Diagnosis]: The ROLLOVA is not rolling smoothly, what happens?
settings.answer: The roller system is built with a certain fraction level to ensure it doesn't slip on most surfaces. But because the fraction between ROLLOVA's tire and surfaces could vary among different materials (e.g. glass, rough surfaces), it may give you the impression of not rolling smoothly sometimes.
